extends java.lang.Object

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static ConfigLoader getInstance()
        Returns the singleton instance of ConfigLoader.
        Returns:
        the singleton instance of ConfigLoader.

      • addReport

        public void addReport(java.lang.String name,
             java.lang.String key)
        Builds an ExportReport object and adds to the internal array.
        Parameters:
        name - the file name of the report.
        key - the resource key to use when displaying it on the UI.

      • getReports

        public java.util.List<ExportReport> getReports()
        Returns all of the ExportReport objects defined. The returned List is an unmodifiable list since it is to be read for configuration purposes only.
        Returns:
        a List of associated ExportReport objects.
